use.flag: Enable backtraces in e2fsck's signal catcher
e2image(8) - Save critical ext2/ext3/ext4 filesystem metadata to a file
e4defrag(8) - online defragmenter for ext4 filesystem
e2initrd-helper program - Get the filesystem table
Samba's Trivial Database (TDB) - used to accelerate certain operations
bitmap stats, print them with `E2FSPROGS_BITMAP_STATS` env var set to anything when running the tools
Build fuse2fs, a FUSE file system client for ext2/ext3/ext4 file systems
